page.title: 03TV, RADIO AND NEWSPAPERS.
page.content: { BBC PEBBLE MILL}is one of the leading communication centres of Europe.Opened in{1971}by{PRINCESS ANNE},the Mill deals with radio and TV.Programmes range from documentaries to interviews {Pebble Mill At One},a lunchtime show, is transmitted every weekday,as is Midlands Today,which is the major regional news programme.Local camera teams cover news around the Midland area for broadcasting each day.{RADIO {WM},which transmits each day from Pebble Mill, has a broadcasting area from north of Derby to Gloucester.The station has a record library of more than 12000 records.It produces a daily breakfast show,a sports programme,chat shows and drama productions,which are recorded in its three studios. A number of local newspapers are produced such as Moseley's{Birmingham {13}and Balsall Heath's{The Heathen}.
